extension.description:
EasyGoSquared Pro Plugin

EasyGoSquared are standard Joomla plugins that add the GoSquared Analytics scripts to your websites pages.

Usage

Simply add the GoSquared ID for your website and choose whether to have GoSquared analytics for the Admin as well.

Don't forget to enable and configure the plugin in the Plug-in Manager.

Credits

EasyGoSquared plugin for Joomla is an open source product created by CPPL for all your custom software projects.
